articles.title: Google Issues Warning to Certain Users After Leaked Data Hack — Here’s Who's Affected - Yahoo News Australia
articles.description: Google has issued a warning to certain users after a date breach involving its Salesforce database, which stores and manages customer data for businesses. The tech giant stated that neither Google Cloud nor Gmail data were affected.
articles.content:
• Certain Google users data may be at risk after a recent breach
  • Hackers attacked the tech giants Salesforce database, which stores and manages customer data for businesses
